transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Good afternoon, this is Lisa Martinez from Premier Collections. Am I speaking with David?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Thank you for taking my call. I'm reaching out regarding an outstanding balance of $1,850 on your account. Do you have a moment to discuss this?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I've been meaning to call. I lost my job last month and I'm struggling.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: I understand that can be difficult. We do have payment plan options available. Would you be able to commit to $100 per month?

transcript.speaker: client
transcript.text: I think I could manage that.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Excellent. I'll set that up for you starting on the 1st of next month. You'll receive a confirmation email today.

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text: Of course. If your situation changes and you need to adjust the payment plan, just give us a call. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
